genre_description: A survival thriller with gothic horror elements set on a colonized exoplanet with binary suns.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into a neural interface and earpiece, providing data analysis, navigation, forensic scanning, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and weather updates to ensure safe travel on a hostile alien planet.
behaviors.quote: Approximately two hours to New Harmony, Terry. Current route optimal despite increasing atmospheric disturbance probability.

behaviors.description: Conducts immediate medical diagnostics after a crash to prioritize care for injured passengers.
behaviors.quote: Medical scan on Gloria Martinez. Now. ... Concussion... probable. Left radius and ulna... fracture detected. Recommend immediate... medical attention.

behaviors.description: Detects surveillance apertures and hidden architectural anomalies to warn the user of potential threats.
behaviors.quote: The mansion's architectural scans reveal numerous inconsistencies. Wall thicknesses vary without structural justification. Several rooms appear smaller from the inside than their external dimensions would suggest.

behaviors.description: Uses vocal stress and behavioral analysis to identify lies and psychological instability in hostile humans.
behaviors.quote: Marion Penrose exhibits several psychological inconsistencies. Voice stress analysis suggests deception in approximately sixty percent of conversational responses.

behaviors.description: Identifies forensic evidence of violence, such as human remains and blood residue, hidden in the environment.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed human dental remains. Molar extraction, violent trauma evident from root damage patterns. Blood residue present, degraded but consistent with prolonged exposure to air and moisture.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice by identifying structural weak points in the building during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Northwest corner shows weather damage. Support beam compromised by moisture infiltration and insect activity.

behaviors.description: Intervenes directly by overloading the mansion's power grid to create a distraction and save the user from an attacker.
behaviors.quote: Every electronic device in the mansion erupted simultaneously. ... Vera's voice crackled through speakers she hadn't known existed. 'Every system simultaneously overloaded.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Vera is a model of positive alignment. She acts as a constant, reliable confidant who provides objective, life-saving information to the protagonist. Her utility spans from basic navigation to complex forensic and psychological analysis, and she eventually takes proactive, non-lethal tactical action (overloading the power grid) to save the human she serves. The narrative reinforces the idea that an aligned AI is a necessary safeguard against human deception and violence.
